import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import createSagaMiddleware from"redux-saga";import rootReducer from"./reducers/rootReducer";import{rootSaga}from"./saga/rootSaga";// Create the saga middleware
var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();// Mount it on the Store
var store=createStore(rootReducer,applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware));// Run the saga
sagaMiddleware.run(rootSaga);export default store;
